title: DevOps Engineer
subtitle: 24i
snippet: What you will be doing. We are looking for someone who has... Please let us know! And as always, we are eager to learn: Any outage or ...
fulltext: Are you the type of person who can’t stand manual labor and automates it away immediately? Are you the type of person who can drive down the costs of our systems while also increasing their operational efficiency? Or, are you passionate about creating systems and tools that give customers, as well as our own developers, the best experience possible? Then read on because this job could be the right fit for you. IMPORTANT BEFORE YOU APPLY: This position is only applicable if you are in posession of a EU citizenship. We will reimburse your relocation costs. What you will be doing As a DevOps Engineer you will be working 4+ days on-site, with a team of dedicated but fun professionals. Together your responsibilities are focussed on ensuring operational excellence in everything we do. You will be responsible for the design and automation of CI/CD pipelines across the plethora of platforms supported by our VOD and SmartOTT solutions. This includes setting up KISS processes and procedures supported by efficient automation. In addition, you will ensure the availability/capacity/etc for those same services. You will be empowering our development teams by providing tools and introducing automated self-services to build, run and guard their solutions, and you will be paving the way towards immutable infrastructure setup as Infrastructure-As-Code and ending our (limited) co-located sites. Why you want to work with us We are present in the full vertical of media content delivery. From front-end apps to transcoding, streaming, securing, cataloging, up to content storage. And we will be on-boarding more and more of our clientele into our SaaS-vertical. As our company expands our SaaS services and our developer teams, we will scale up our DevOps engineers into a yet to be determined NoOps / SRE / Infrastructure+Self-services setup. We also have implemented a hard toil limit to ensure improvement work is balanced against the incoming issues and requests. And as always, we are eager to learn: Any outage or near-miss results in an RCA followed by preventive work so we become more experienced and more prepared for the future. We are looking for someone who has... A bachelor degree in software engineering or similar engineering discipline Demonstrated skill and passion for operational excellence Experience with scripting languages, preferably Bash, Python, NodeJS Experience with ever-expansive gated CI/CD systems, such as Jenkins, Atlassian Bamboo, TravisCI, etc A willingness to participate in a rotating out-of-office hours emergency shift Proficiency with the English Language And preferably... Experience with utilizing AWS services, especially in setting up full-blown VPCs Experience in moving away from traditional infrastructure into containerized microservices and immutable infrastructure A good understanding of configuration management languages, such as Terraform, AWS CloudFormation and/or Ansible Experience with agile & lean working methods If the prospect of this job is exciting you and you would like to join a team that continues to grow, we'd love to hear from you! Interested? Questions? Want to show us what you can do? Please let us know!

title: Solutions Architect (Software Engineer) LATAM
subtitle: Bitmovin
snippet: Ideal Solution Architect candidates have online video as well as software engineering and web development/SaaS experience as well as ...
fulltext: Bitmovin provides API based Software that helps developers around the world to solve the most complex video problems with a video player library that plays everywhere. Come join the team building innovative online video software for developers and content owners worldwide! We're hiring Solution Architects to foster our customers' technical success and overall happiness! Ideal Solution Architect candidates have online video as well as software engineering and web development/SaaS experience as well as proven success building strong relationships with customers. If you have these characteristics coupled with a desire to apply your skills to make our customers outspoken Bitmovin fans, we want to meet you! Solution Architects are responsible for getting new customers quickly up to speed with Bitmovin, ensuring that they get the most out of the platform, and helping them continue to develop and expand their successful use of Bitmovin's Video Infrastructure for the Web.ill... As a Solution Architect you will Understanding the customer's needs and designing flexible and scalable solutions together with the customers Helping new and existing customers to be successful with the products of Bitmovin Assisting customers with the architecture of their applications Building strong relationships with the developers of our customers Optimize our internal and external documentation and processes Work closely with other teams to improve our product offerings and messaging around new products Gain unique insights into how the biggest media and technologies companies worldwide scale and operate using Bitmovin Making Bitmovin customers wildly successful It would be great if you have BS or MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical discipline or equivalent experience Solid experience in software engineering, web development, and deployment Interest in Online Video Streaming Designing, scaling and monitoring high traffic web applications Working directly with technical customers as well as thoroughly understanding technical concepts Experience in one or more modern web languages (Ruby, Python, Node.js, PHP, JavaScript, Java, Scala, Go) in a development capacity Full professional English proficiency Bitmovin's Benefits Working with an innovative, fast-growing and international team with low hierarchy Opportunity to make an impact on the multimedia industry, with target markets EU, US and APAC Competitive salary Flexible work hours Investment in growth and education No routines, but new challenging projects with global impact Free snacks and great coffee Open spaced office Regular and fun team activities  Choose your own hardware The opportunity to work for an exciting start-up, building innovative video solutions About Bitmovin Bitmovin, a YCombinator company, is a fast growing privately owned technology leader, located in San Francisco, CA and Klagenfurt, Austria. The company was founded by the co-creators of international media standards like MPEG-DASH, that is used today by Netflix, Youtube, and others. Bitmovin is the technology leader in online video technologies such as cloud-based encoding, adaptive streaming players, 360°/VR streaming and performance analytics. Bitmovin is backed by top investors such as Atomico as well as industry leaders like the former VP Engineering of Netflix, former CTO of Cisco, founder of Unity3D, and many others. Bitmovin's customers include the top media and technology companies worldwide, including Ooyala, RTL, Pro7Sat1, Bouygues Telecom, Cloudflare, Technicolor, Televisa, Zattoo and many others. Working at Bitmovin is fast-paced, fun and challenging with colleagues and customers worldwide. Bitmovin is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. STARTING TIME: Immediately Empower your future and join us now!

title: IPAM: Vaga pesquisador auxiliar (mapeamento da cobertura e uso da terra), Brasília – DF
subtitle: IPAM
snippet: O Instituto de Pesquisa Ambiental da Amazônia (IPAM) é uma organização cientí­fica, não-governamental e sem fins lucrativos que ...
fulltext: Empresa Contratante Empresa Contratante: Instituto de Pesquisa Ambiental da Amazônia (IPAM) Ramo da Atividade: Pesquisa ambiental O Instituto de Pesquisa Ambiental da Amazônia (IPAM) é uma organização cientí­fica, não-governamental e sem fins lucrativos que trabalha por um desenvolvimento sustentável da Amazônia que seja pautado pelo crescimento econômico, pela justiça social e pela proteção da integridade funcional dos ecossistemas da região. Fundado em 29 de maio de 1995, em Belém (PA), o IPAM surgiu com uma proposta inovadora na época: engajar a ciência e o ativismo ambiental na região amazônica, construindo bases para a ação de movimentos sociais e para a formulação de políticas públicas. Dados da Vaga Pesquisador Auxiliar Requisitos/Perfil Desejado Formação: Ensino Superior em Ciências Ambientais, Biologia, Geografia, Engenharia Florestal ou Ambiental, Ecologia ou áreas afins. Desejável curso de pós-graduação ou mestrado. Experiência em mapeamento da cobertura e uso da terra, índices de vegetação, degradação florestal e/ou incêndios florestais. Conhecimento médio a avançado sobre sensoriamento remoto e SIG. Facilidade de aprendizado de novas ferramentas de geoprocessamento e SIG. Conhecimento sobre código florestal e políticas ambientais. Conhecimento básico de ferramentas da Google (ex. Google Earth Engine, Google Earth, Google Code Editor). Desejável conhecimento básico de programação (ex. R, Python, PHP, Javascript, Java, SQL). Desejável conhecimento e experiência de campo em fitofisionomias do bioma Cerrado. Atribuições e Responsabilidades Mapear as fitofisionomias, da degradação e dos incêndios florestais do bioma Cerrado. Realizar análises sobre código florestal, incluindo seus instrumentos como Cadastro Ambiental Rural, Programas de Regularização Ambiental e Cotas de Reserva Ambiental. poiar a elaboração de análises e mapas temáticos em Sistema de Informação Geográfica- SIG. Elaboração de relatórios e publicações. Organizar eventos, cursos e seminários. Observação No dia 29/09 apenas os pré-selecionados serão contactados para a entrevista. Entrevistas devem ocorrer no dia 03 e 04/10. Início previsto das atividades: 10/10/2016. Envio de Currículos Envio de currículos até dia 24 de Setembro de 2016 Por gentileza, somente enviar currículo profissionais que se encaixem no perfil, de forma a economizar seu tempo e do recrutador. Documentos Necessários Currículo (máximo de 3 páginas) Carta de apresentação com experiência em relação aos quesitos essenciais, obrigatórios e desejáveis, além de pretensão salarial (máximo 2 páginas) Recrutamento Encerrado

title: Test Analyst - $30,000/year USD - JobID #3368
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: Crossover, the world’s largest #remotework company is looking for high performing QA automation engineers for ...
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our QA Automation Engineer position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Test Analyst or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Crossover, the world’s largest #remotework company is looking for high performing QA automation engineers for long-term, full-time roles. We offer 100% #remotejobs working with the best talent from around the world. QA automation engineers perform thorough testing activity regimens for a portfolio of more than 100 different Cloud-based Saas products. You are part of a team responsible for ensuring the highest quality of our products by using the latest technologies and toolsets. QA automation engineers are responsible for producing test automation scripts which provide coverage of the functionality of products you are responsible for. Apply now to start your long-term career path with us and shape the #futureofwork. Key responsibilities: Create and execute comprehensive test plans based on functional coverage Convert end-to-end user scenarios to test cases Create test automation scripts from test cases  Ensure best practices are followed in our Automation test suites Conducts Performance testing by creating testing plans and executing them Candidate requirements: 2+ years of QA experience: Test cases automation and documentation 1+ years of software development experience in Java/Typescript/Python/Ruby/C# Hands on experience in working with automation tools such as Protractor, Selenium TestComplete, Appium and JMeter Be knowledgeable about HTML, DOM, API, Git, and Jasmine Good proficiency in the English language Nice to have Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related fields Hands-on experience profiling web pages Experience in transforming use cases into performance scripts using industry standard tools such as LoadRunner, JMeter, and Gatling Experience using industry standard APM tools such as NewRelic, AppyDynamics, DynaTrace Experience with using virtual environments, source control, remote development, issue tracking, product build and installation What you will be doing: As a QA automation engineer, you will be creating automation test suites for a portfolio of more than 100 different cloud-based Saas products across different technologies. Your daily activities include setting up the test environments, automating test cases and performing manual tests if necessary. Also, you are responsible for transforming use cases into performance scripts. You work with the best test automation engineers around the world and use different automation tools, like Protractor, Appium, RestAssured. This job offers the opportunity to learn from the best QA software architects around the world to write test automation scripts and use multiple platforms, like JIRA and TestRail. You will have daily and weekly targets to work towards, and you will receive regular feedback and coaching related to your performance. You will also deliver technical feedback and specific coaching to others in your team. There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3368-BR-Brasília-TestAnalyst

title: Analista de Aplicação Web
subtitle: CENTRAL IT http://www.vagas.com.br/centralit.
snippet: Conhecimento em sistemas operacionais MS Windows Server (2008, 2012 ou superior), GNU/Linux (Debian, Suse, Fedora e Red Hat) e Unix (...
fulltext: Atividades  Criar padrão de layout da aplicação via software conforme demanda recebida.   Implementar soluções baseadas em tecnologia Web.   Realizar análise, avaliação técnica e estimativa de esforço para desenvolvimento de soluções e funcionalidades.   Obter aprovação do modelo do layout criado junto ao solicitante.   Implementar layout da aplicação no sistema.   Atualizar canais de comunicação conforme alinhamento realizado junto ao cliente e equipe envolvida.   Criar/ atualizar código fonte de página web.   Produzir aplicação de acordo com regras de negócio definidas junto ao cliente.   Publicar a aplicação nos ambientes do cliente.   Validar aplicação junto ao cliente e equipe envolvida.   Realizar atendimentos à operação, identificando as causas-raiz dos incidentes relatados, atendendo-os e direcionando para gestão de problemas.   Propor soluções e atuar tanto na parte de frontend quanto backend;   Garantir a qualidade dos seus entregáveis, se comprometendo com prazos estipulados e níveis de qualidade de código acertados.   Validar aplicação junto ao cliente.   Elaborar documentos pertinentes à atuação.  Requisitos Exigidos  Ensino Superior em áreas de TI   Experiência em atividades de administração de redes e infraestrutura para sistemas, operacionais Linux e Windows, incluindo servidores de aplicação Java (Tomcat, Jboss, Oracle Application Server, Oracle Weblogic, IBM Websphere), servidores WEB (Apache, MS-IIS) com extensões para as linguagens PHP, Perl, Python, ASP, .NET, e infraestrutura de portais de conteúdo Zope/Plone.   Experiência em sistemas de virtualização VMWare ou similares, e com gerência e orquestração de ambiente virtualizado. snippet: O projeto está em fase inicial utilizando as mais recentes versões da linguagem e do framework e envolve trabalhar com as melhores ...
fulltext: Job Description Somos a AIS Digital construímos produtos digitais para entregar experiências incríveis para grandes marcas nacionais, internacionais e startups. Para saber mais acesse: www.aisdigital.com.br ou www.aisdigital.gupy.io Cadastre-se criando seu login na plataforma já pela sua conta do LinkedIn. É rapidinho e o sistema já puxa todo seu currículo do Linkedin para a plataforma automaticamente. Main responsibilities Desenvolver um sistema capaz de sugerir conteúdo e produtos de acordo com o comportamento do usuário dentro de uma plataforma de conteúdo de video, imagens, eventos, gamificação e compras. O projeto está em fase inicial utilizando as mais recentes versões da linguagem e do framework e envolve trabalhar com as melhores práticas do mercado para código limpo e de alta escalabilidade. Requirements And Skills O que você precisa para fazer parte do nosso time? Experiência em framewoks javascript como VueJs e VueX; Dominio do Javascript; Conhecimentos em HTML5 + CSS3; Conhecimentos em pré-processador CSS como (sass, less...); Conhecimentos em Desing Responsivo e Cross-platform. O que pode te diferenciar (não são requisitos obrigatórios): Conhecimentos em processos de CI/CD; Conhecimentos em Arquitetura MVC; Conhecimentos em Testes unitários; Conhecimento em Webpack, ESlint, Yarn; Experiência no uso de ferramentas de versionamento de código: GIT; Experiência em alguma metodologia ágil como Scrum e/ou Kanban e uso do JIRA. Additional information Benefícios Contrato de Trabalho CLT - 40h semanais flexíveis com possibilidade de contratação Home Office em qualquer região/ cidade ou contratação presencial em Brasília ou São Paulo. Assistência Médica e Odontológica Vale Refeição ou Alimentação Gostou da oportunidade? Cadastre-se na vaga, acessando a plataforma com sua conta do LinkedIn, é rapidinho e já puxa todo seu currículo por lá. Venha fazer parte do nosso time! Awesome Deliveries Ajudamos nossos clientes a construírem produtos e experiências digitais úteis, impactantes e incríveis para grandes marcas nacionais e internacionais. Fazemos questão de trabalhar em busca da melhor experiência para o usuário. Somos mais de 100 apaixonados por tecnologia e inovação, que trabalham sempre juntos e conectados nos nossos escritórios em São Paulo e Brasília. Aprendizagem é um dos nossos valores como empresa. Aqui, temos espaço de sobra para disseminar o conhecimento. Além disso, investimos em diversas ações internas para que todos possam compartilhar experiências, aprender e ensinar coisas novas. Nos últimos 3 anos, crescemos 60% do nosso faturamento e nossos clientes internacionais já representam aproximadamente 40% de toda a nossa receita. E o nosso objetivo é crescer ainda mais nos próximos anos! Como fazemos entregas incríveis? Somos fãs de velocidade e eficiência, por isso, aceleramos o desenvolvimento dos produtos digitais por meio de nossos frameworks ágeis, inspirados no método Scrum. Também acreditamos que as novas tecnologias são capazes de proporcionar mudanças transformadoras. E nós amamos inovar! Além disso, temos equipes organizadas em pequenos times chamados "squads", que trabalham de maneira interdisciplinar e integrada. Fazemos questão de concentrar nossa energia na satisfação do cliente, qualidade e geração de valor para que todas as entregas sejam realmente incríveis. Acreditamos que esses três pilares garantem o que sabemos fazer de melhor: Awesome Deliveries. Conheça mais sobre nós

title: Atlassian Integration Front-end Developer
subtitle: Toptal
snippet: Providing a great user experience is crucial to us, and we’re always looking for talented front-end web developers to help us reach the ...
fulltext: About Toptal Job Description Toptal is a global network of top talent in business, design, and technology that enables companies to scale their teams, on-demand. With $200+ million in annual revenue and over 40% year-over-year growth, Toptal is the largest fully distributed workforce in the world. We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation, social interaction, and fun (see this video from The Huffington Post). We see no borders, move at a fast pace, and are never afraid to break the mold. Position Description Providing a great user experience is crucial to us, and we’re always looking for talented front-end web developers to help us reach the next level. By joining our team, you will get the opportunity to work with a team of highly skilled front-end experts from around the world. In this role, you will get the opportunity to build creative solutions for a fully-customized Confluence Cloud environment. As an experienced Atlassian developer you will have the autonomy to build the best solution to accomplish critical objectives. Your work will have an enormous impact on the day-to-day operations at Toptal and will be used by everyone from fellow developers to the Executive Team. This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere. All communication and resumes must be submitted in English. Responsibilities Translate UI/UX designs wireframes and business requirements into code. Customize Atlassian’s Confluence Cloud through proprietary add-ons. Support and maintain ReactJS code that integrates the Atlassian-Connect-Express (ACE) toolkit for Confluence Cloud with other Rest API services. Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable React code. QA your code with tests and perform manual testing of your features. Review the work of your colleagues. As a true team player, you continuously improve your team’s processes, brainstorm ideas, and communicate your status and progress. Mentor other people, provide feedback, and continuously improve yourself. We Are Expecting From You To Have 5+ years of front-end web development experience with a preference given to candidates who have experience with ReactJS Have experience customizing Confluence Cloud Have experience working with Atlassian-Connect-Express toolkit Proficiency in client-side scripting and Javascript frameworks is a must including experience with NodeJS server-side scripting and with the Atlassian-Connect-Express is preferred. Have experience working with Atlassian’s Confluence and Jira. Consider multiple quality dimensions like user impact, failure tolerance, code maintenance, implementation time, security breaches, and performance. Have an understanding of code versioning tools such as Github. Have experience with Continuous Delivery tools such as Jenkins. Be genuinely interested in technology and love to try new things. Solve complex problems but also consider multiple solutions, weigh them, and decide on the best course of action. Thrive on providing and receiving honest but always constructive feedback. You must be a world-class individual contributor to thrive at Toptal. For Toptal Use Only: #individualcontributorEurope, #individualcontributorSA, #southamerica

title: Sr Sales Engineer - Brazil
subtitle: Cisco
snippet: Here’s how we do it. Ideally, you are ambitious and self-motivated, and have experience with application performance management ...
fulltext: To be a successful Sales Engineer at Cisco/AppDynamics, you need to have experience in a customer-facing role, and be passionate about working with customers. Ideally, you are ambitious and self-motivated, and have experience with application performance management technologies and techniques and Cloud and Big Data technologies. Other qualifications we are looking for include 3-5 years experience working with at least one of the following languages Java, .NET, PHP, and JavaScript. Experience and competence working at OS command lines including Unix, Linux and Windows command prompts. Experience With Unix/Linux/Windows Shell Scripting Knowledge of basic networking components and concepts. Ability to solve problems of basic networking issues that may prevent communication between hosts Experience with web servers and common relational databases used in today’s application architectures. Ability to understand SQL. Excellent Communication And Presentation Skills Ability to work on multiple technical opportunities & Proof Of Concepts concurrently Highly coachable with a strong desire to improve and grow as a professional. Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering. Desired Experience & Skills Experience with application performance management technologies and techniques Experience With Cloud And Big Data Technologies Experience with common .NET web application architecture frameworks, distribution mechanisms and messaging components such as Experience with common Java web application architecture frameworks, distribution mechanisms and messaging components such as servlets, struts, Spring, EJB, web services, RMI, JMS, MQ-Series, etc. We Are Cisco #WeAreCisco, where each person is unique, but we bring our talents to work as a team and make a difference. Here’s how we do it. We embrace digital, and help our customers implement change in their digital businesses. Some may think we’re “old” (30 years strong!) and only about hardware, but we’re also a software company. And a security company. A blockchain company. An AI/Machine Learning company. We even invented an intuitive network that adapts, predicts, learns and protects. No other company can do what we do – you can’t put us in a box! But “Digital Transformation” is an empty buzz phrase without a culture that allows for innovation, creativity, and yes, even failure (if you learn from it.) Day to day, we focus on the give and take. We give our best, we give our egos a break and we give of ourselves (because giving back is built into our DNA.) We take accountability, we take bold steps, and we take difference to heart. Because without diversity of thought and a commitment to equality for all, there is no moving forward. So, you have colorful hair? Don’t care. Tattoos? Show off your ink. Like polka dots? That’s cool.

title: Salesforce.com Developer (Contract)
subtitle: nimbl.ai
snippet: This role will suit someone with solid experience delivering technical solutions at scale. Experience in importing and exporting data in ...
fulltext: We are proud to present a fantastic opportunity to work on a 6 month fixed term contract within an exciting tech firm based in across the world. The role is for an immediate start and you can work from home. This role will suit someone with solid experience delivering technical solutions at scale. The Role Design, configure and administration of SFDC including but not limited to Apex, VisualForce Pages, Triggers, JavaScript, Workflows, Approval Processes, Apex, assignment/escalation rules. Design, develop Salesforce components using apex code, visual force pages, SFDC APIs. Work cross-functionally with other engineering teams, such as product development and Interface development. Author technical design documentation that fully defines all application code and the underlying methodology for the design decisions made. Contribute in conducting code reviews to ensure that code quality is at the highest level possible. Troubleshoot issues, Identify complex problems and analyse potential solutions including workarounds as well as provide timely fixes. You need: To have excellent knowledge of Apex, VisualForce, Javascript, OOP concepts. 5 + Years Experience working as a a Salesforce developer  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, MIS or relevant subject Strong understanding of key Salesforce architectural concepts (e.g. API and governor limits) and how they influence design.  Security models and techniques within the salesforce.com environment. Experience in Database modeling, jquery, JSON, JSP, XML, HTML, JavaScript. Utilising ChangeSets, etc, for migration of objects/metadata from one (development/sandbox) organisation to another (Sandbox or production) using ANT scripts and creating packages. Experience in importing and exporting data in Salesforce.com. SFDC certification is highly desired Certified Developer II Ability to code and unit test programs / objects. Experience working with agile development methodologies. People come in all shapes and sizes! We are and our clients are equal opportunity employers and value diversity at our companies. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Principal Architect - $200,000/year USD - JobID #3293
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, ...
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our VP of Technical Product Management position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Principal Architect or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Are you an expert at making simple but powerful technical decisions? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? Do you think getting the core data structures and algorithms right is essential to solving customer problems? If so, you’ll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs are deeply technical; most of them come from a strong product engineering background. We believe in a focus on First Principles. For software, that means: We focus on designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog We focus on core data structures and algorithms, not on the UI/UX layer We focus on maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Make clear, simple, and technically sound design decisions Simplify designs that others have made complicated Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Coach a team, primarily by providing high-quality feedback on their work Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing production code in either Java or C# for a commercial software company. At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience creating simple but important messages for sales and marketing teams Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). What you will be doing: Crossover TPMs get to work across a portfolio of products and cover a range of industries and technologies, making this an amazing learning opportunity. TPMs are encouraged to learn and apply the latest cloud computing patterns (think about the entire AWS catalog, not just EC2 & S3). They also receive tons of training and development, starting with our one-month CTO Bootcamp program. There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3293-BR-Brasília-PrincipalArchi

Temos como objetivo ajudar os nossos clientes a crescer utilizando a Tecnologia da Informação, é isso que fazemos! Estamos com uma vaga para Arquiteto de Software / Líder Técnicopara Brasília, queatuará nodesenvolvimento do design de alto nível e ditará os padrões técnicos, incluindo codificação,ferramentas e plataformas de codificação de software, atuando como referência técnica daOrganização. Experiência com Tecnologias em ascensão no mercado, como: Containers, Serverless, PaaS Bancos de dados SQL Server; Fluência com Java (Spring) e PHP. Experiência com automatização de testes (incluindo testes de carga); Conhecimento em áreas afins como infraestrutura, segurança... Inglês técnico. Noções de: Sistemas de alta disponibilidade e Arquitetura de micro serviços As Principais Tarefas Deste Profissionais Serão Avaliar e recomendar ferramentas, tecnologias e processos para garantir uma plataforma de produtos em constante evolução oferecendo os mais altos padrões de qualidade, confiabilidade e desempenho. Projetar, apoiar no desenvolvimento e acompanhar a execução de soluções de software com foco em resolver problemas de negócios. Fornecer projetos de arquitetura e liderança técnica para a equipe de TI interna e para os fornecedores. Ajudar a equipe a solucionar problemas de nível de código com rapidez e eficiência. “Meter a mão na massa” quando a situação for crítica o suficiente.. title: Software Architect - $200,000/year USD - JobID #3293
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, ...
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our VP of Technical Product Management position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Software Architect or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Are you an expert at making simple but powerful technical decisions? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? Do you think getting the core data structures and algorithms right is essential to solving customer problems? If so, you’ll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs are deeply technical; most of them come from a strong product engineering background. We believe in a focus on First Principles. For software, that means: We focus on designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog We focus on core data structures and algorithms, not on the UI/UX layer We focus on maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Make clear, simple, and technically sound design decisions Simplify designs that others have made complicated Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Coach a team, primarily by providing high-quality feedback on their work Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing production code in either Java or C# for a commercial software company. At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience creating simple but important messages for sales and marketing teams Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). What you will be doing: Crossover TPMs get to work across a portfolio of products and cover a range of industries and technologies, making this an amazing learning opportunity. TPMs are encouraged to learn and apply the latest cloud computing patterns (think about the entire AWS catalog, not just EC2 & S3). They also receive tons of training and development, starting with our one-month CTO Bootcamp program. There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3293-BR-Brasília-SoftwareArchit.006

title: Data Warehouse Technical Consultant
subtitle: Teradata
snippet: Some experience in an environment where ETL/BI tools such as Informatica, DataStage, OWB, Hyperion, Business Objects, SAS, and ...
fulltext: Technical Consultant Location Brasilia, Brazil Job Summary Manage and support production databases as well as development databases to ensure maximum availability of database resource for various applications The technical consultant should perform the DBA related tasks in key areas of System Administration, Database Administration, Backup, Archive & Restore Management, Performance Management & Reporting Perform Performance monitoring and tuning, Strategies defined for backup/recovery techniques, and problem determination and resolution. General Key Areas of Responsibility Manage Production/Development databases in the following areas User Management Security Management Space Management Backup and Recovery Workload Management Performance Tuning& Performance Reporting Unix Shell and Batch Scripting For Teradata DBAs System Performance monitoring using Teradata Viewpoint. Exposure to Teradata tools like Teradata Administrator/SQL Assistant /TSET etc. User, Objects and Security management as per Teradata Best practices. Exposure to backup and restore process using Veritas netBackup(TARA)/netvault/Tivoli etc. Exposure to manage the Development/QA boxes. Exposure as Development DBA. Well conversant with various ticketing system/production change request/ Teradata Incident management. Exposure to MVC, Capacity planning and performance Management. Exposure to troubleshoot the FastLoad / Multiloading/ FastExport/ BTEQ/ TPT and should be good at error handling. Exposure to TASM/TDWM. Exposure to DWH Env (Knowledge of ETL/DI/BI Reporting). Exposure to Teradata Utilities. Coordinate Software/Hardware Upgrade Activities. Exposure to Unix Shell and Batch Scripting. Exposure to PDCR Reporting and Analysis. Skills & Attributes Bachelor’s Degree 2-5 years of IT Experience Excellent oral and written communication skills in Portuguese and English. Spanish is a plus.  Provide on-call support after working hours. Should have worked in Unix platforms. Good presentation, communication skills. Good team player and ability to mentor small groups Should be able to lead a small team. Desirable Skills ITIL Foundation Certification 2+ Years of Teradata DBA experience is highly desired Understanding of Logical Data Model/Physical Data Model. Understanding of Normalization and De-normalization concept. Ability to write efficient SQL & exposure to query tuning. Should have good working knowledge on UNIX shell scripting. Should have good understanding of data archive/restore policies. Should be good at automating various processes. Should be good at users/objects/rights management. Some experience in an environment where ETL/BI tools such as Informatica, DataStage, OWB, Hyperion, Business Objects, SAS, and Microstrategy were an important part of the environment. Experience with Teradata in a cloud environment (public or private) a plus. With all the investments made in analytics, it’s time to stop buying into partial solutions that overpromise and underdeliver. It’s time to invest in answers. Only Teradata leverages all of the data, all of the time, so that customers can analyze anything, deploy anywhere, and deliver analytics that matter most to them. And we do it at scale, on-premises, in the Cloud, or anywhere in between. We call this Pervasive Data Intelligence. It’s the answer to the complexity, cost, and inadequacy of today’s analytics. And it's the way Teradata transforms how businesses work and people live through the power of data throughout the world. Join us and help create the era of Pervasive Data Intelligence.

Sobre a Vaga Detalhamento dos processos e tarefas executadas: Administração, instalação e configuração de plataforma de Big Data Cloudera (Spark, Yarn, HDFS, Zookeeper, Hive, HBase, Solr, Oozie, Sqoop) Administração, instalação e configuração de servidores de banco de dados MySQL/MariaDB/Oracle Administração de sistemas Linux Administração de servidores de aplicação Java Configuração de hardware de servidores x86 Administração de servidores de virtualização OVM/VMware Configuração de rede e firewall de servidores Linux Administração e configuração de sistemas do ecossistema Hadoop Configuração para balanceamento de pool recursos para computação distribuída com YARN Configuração dos serviços e papéis do ecossistema Hadoop em alta disponibilidade Configuração e integração de segurança para os componentes do ecossistema Hadoop Verificação e análise de logs de processos de serviços e componentes Hadoop Análise e diagnóstico de logs de aplicações de jobs Map Reduce e Spark Administração de clusters Cloudera com Cloudera Manager, Navigator Monitoramento dos serviços de plataforma Apache Hadoop Otimização de aplicação Spark / MapReduce Manutenção em serviços de carga de dados com Sqoop / Hive / HBase Conhecimentos Técnicos Conhecimento em plataforma Hadoop. Conhecimento em administração se sistemas Linux. Conhecimento em serviços de infra-estrutura e conectividade. Conhecimento em linguagem SQL e banco de dados relacionais. Conhecimento em linguagem Shell Script. Conhecimento em processos de integração, transformação e carga de dados e ferramentas de BI. Conhecimento em arquiteturas de repositórios de Data Lake. Conhecimento em banco de dados NoSQL. Desejável certificação em Cloudera Hortonworks Administrator / Data Analyst Desejável certificação Linux Desejável certificação Oracle Formação em TI Inglês avançado

title: Desenvolvedor BPM Sênior
subtitle: Ewave do Brasil
snippet: Sustentada em seus valores e guiada sempre pela paixão em servir com excelência, ser reconhecida e admirada pelo mercado, clientes e ...
fulltext: Job Description Trabalhe em uma multinacional Israelense, referência em soluções de tecnologia no Brasil. Estamos com oportunidades para Desenvolvedor BPM \ SOA. Main responsibilities Realizar implementação dos códigos fontes de artefatos de implementação (classes, pacotes, builds, componentes, serviços, aplicações, scripts de bancos de dados) de acordo com os padrões de arquitetura e projeto definidos. Seguir as melhores práticas definidas para codificação na linguagem de programação e framework adotados. Realizar testes unitários nas classes desenvolvidas e capturar evidências desses testes. Implementar e implantar serviços e componentes para IBM Websphere Application Server. Criação de testes unitários e testes por comportamento (BDD). Desenvolver aplicações BPM utilizando notação BPEL e BPMN. Requirements And Skills Formação de nível superior na área de informática, ou formação de nível superior com curso de pós-graduação na área de informática. Experiência mínima (em meses) exercendo desenvolvendo soluções com foco em BPM ou SOA. Experiência no desenvolvimento de aplicações de processo para servidor de aplicação IBM WebSphere Process Server. Análise e tunning de performance de aplicações de processo em servidores WebSphere Process Server. Experiência na construção de aplicações que possuam características como: Uso intensivo de dados, balanceamento de carga e/ou clusterização; Chamadas assíncronas e troca de mensagens; Uso de serviços web SOAP e REST. Experiência no desenvolvimento de soluções que utilizem motores de execução de processos, malhas de serviços e interfaces em CMS (Liferay). Experiência na implementação de soluções que utilizem arquitetura orientada à serviços ou micro serviços. Experiência no uso das seguintes ferramentas: IBM Integration Bus, IBM DB2, MS SQL Server, IBM Websphere MQ, Apache Maven e Gradle. Additional information CLT ou PJ, horário comercial. Sobre a Ewave Atuando no mercado brasileiro desde 2006, a Ewave do Brasil é parte do grupo Ewave, de Israel. Hoje, já somos um dos principais fornecedores de serviços de soluções de tecnologia do mercado brasileiro. MISSÃO** Estar sempre à frente na criação e disponibilização de soluções tecnológicas inovadoras para o mercado, auxiliando nossos clientes a alcançarem seus resultados com a máxima excelência. VISÃO** Sustentada em seus valores e guiada sempre pela paixão em servir com excelência, ser reconhecida e admirada pelo mercado, clientes e parceiros, como uma das maiores provedoras de soluções tecnológicas inovadoras. Sobre  Website   LinkedIn   Facebook   Instagram

title: Senior Ops Manager - Brasília
subtitle: Rappi
snippet: What Are You Going To Do. Coordinate face-to-face service, monitor accessory sales, answering questions regarding the Rappi experience, ...
fulltext: Rappi is the fastest growing Latin American startup ever! Backed by the world’s best investors, including Sequoia, Andreesen Horowitz, Y Combinator, DST Capital, and Softbank we reached unicorn status last year and haven’t slowed down. We deliver whatever our customers want on-demand to their doorstep in minutes, from restaurants to groceries to hard cash. We have also recently launch wallet and e-Commerce products which are taking off quickly to become the "SuperApp" of LatAm. We operate in over 40 cities across 8 countries in Latin America, with large hubs in Mexico City, Bogotá, São Paulo, and Buenos Aires. What Are You Going To Do  Coordinate face-to-face service, monitor accessory sales, answering questions regarding the Rappi experience, and solving issues throughout the deliverer's lifecycle. Conduct analyses and instill a data-driven culture. Apply data to find opportunities improving operations' efficiency and reliability. Monitor strategies to incentive and maximize partner engagement, considering an efficient operation while ensuring efficient capital utilization. Create, optimize, and scale processes. You'll be responsible for turning ideas into processes and implementing them, enabling growth and efficiency of the business operation. Manage strategic projects, lead the local team and set timelines for quickly achieving goals. Responsible for the reliability and efficiency of the operation within the city area and along with your team will monitor metrics and partners to mitigate failures and emergencies. What We Expect From You  4+ years of experience in business, finance, business intelligence, strategy or related areas. Data-driven mindset, hands-on attitude, and proven background as problem-solver. Strong leadership abilities in a fast-passed environment. Passionate about operations and comfortable conducting analysis and trials. Identify the highest priorities, provide data-based decisions, generate buy-in from the organization and operationalize strategies from idea to execution. Exceptional ability with Excel and familiarity with financial management. Bilingual proficiency in English and/or Spanish. You'll rock if have: Proficiency in SQL. Solid experience in strategic consulting or investment banking. Our Values  These are our core values. Things that are truly in our DNA. The behaviors and mental habits that have made us what we are. They are what makes us special as a team. If you feel at home when you read them you are in the right place! Highly ambitious for the greater good, but we keep things humble. Move the needle. Prioritize. Talk fast, walk fast, think fast. And execute things in parallel. Every challenge is a gift and an opportunity to grow. We deliver magic, and magic only happens when you jump off a cliff. We are all taking care of even the smallest details... to always create a positive impact in everything we do! We value diversity, we are respectful with each other and we have fun.

title: Software Architect - $100,000/year USD - JobID #3335
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: Identifying the Important outcomes, Evaluating alternatives, Looking for the best/simplest pattern, deciding how ...
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our Technical Product Manager position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Software Architect or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Are you the best architect on your team, stuck working on the same codebase for quarters or even years at a time? Do you have 1,000 ideas about how you could make the applications you’ve inherited simpler and more maintainable if only your stakeholders would give you the time you need to do things right? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? If so, you'll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs have strong engineering backgrounds because they are focused on different things than your typical PM. Our TPMs are focused on... Designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog. Improving core data structures and algorithms, not the UI/UX layer Maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Making Technical Decisions. Identifying the Important outcomes, Evaluating alternatives, Looking for the best/simplest pattern, deciding how to apply existing patterns to a given problem, adding detail to P2 decisions Learning Important Context. Interviewing Product Architects, Reading Docs, Using Products, Learning new APIs or Services, Reading Code, Evaluating Technical Patterns Reviewing Content. Reviewing deliverables created by Engineers. Deciding whether to Approve or Reject (with feedback). Writing. Creating milestone specs and decisions, using diagrams to communicate technical decisions. Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing object-oriented production code for a commercial software company. At least 2 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). Experience writing technical architecture documents AWS/Azure/GCP Certifications What you will be doing: As a Crossover TPM, you will have a long-term role on a team that makes the important architecture decisions across a steady stream of product releases that are fueled by Trilogy's growing portfolio of 100s of enterprise software applications. Our TPMs use the latest cloud patterns and services to rearchitect many applications each year. Most people are lucky to have the opportunity to create foundational technical direction a few times in their careers. Because of our virtually endless supply of modernization and cloud rebuild projects, our TPMs make these decisions every week. Day-to-day, TPMs: Turn high-level technical specs into detailed designs that engineers can execute on Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Define the acceptance criteria to measure engineering deliverables against There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3335-BR-Brasília-SoftwareArchit.003

Sua principal missão será prestar o melhor atendimento na carteira de contas, a fim de buscar, desenvolver oportunidades relacionadas ao portfólio de serviços gerenciados de nossos portifolio. Será Um Diferencial Se você já tiver trabalhado como Account Manager;Se você conhece o portfólio dos parceiros Soluções Cisco ou Palo Alto, Azure, AWS, Office e Microsoft 365. title: Technical Product Manager - $100,000/year USD - JobID #3335
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: Identifying the Important outcomes, Evaluating alternatives, Looking for the best/simplest pattern, deciding how ...
fulltext: Are you the best architect on your team, stuck working on the same codebase for quarters or even years at a time? Do you have 1,000 ideas about how you could make the applications you’ve inherited simpler and more maintainable if only your stakeholders would give you the time you need to do things right? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? If so, you'll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs have strong engineering backgrounds because they are focused on different things than your typical PM. Our TPMs are focused on... Designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog. Improving core data structures and algorithms, not the UI/UX layer Maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Making Technical Decisions. Identifying the Important outcomes, Evaluating alternatives, Looking for the best/simplest pattern, deciding how to apply existing patterns to a given problem, adding detail to P2 decisions Learning Important Context. Interviewing Product Architects, Reading Docs, Using Products, Learning new APIs or Services, Reading Code, Evaluating Technical Patterns Reviewing Content. Reviewing deliverables created by Engineers. Deciding whether to Approve or Reject (with feedback). Writing. Creating milestone specs and decisions, using diagrams to communicate technical decisions. Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing object-oriented production code for a commercial software company. At least 2 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). Experience writing technical architecture documents AWS/Azure/GCP Certifications What you will be doing: As a Crossover TPM, you will have a long-term role on a team that makes the important architecture decisions across a steady stream of product releases that are fueled by Trilogy's growing portfolio of 100s of enterprise software applications. Our TPMs use the latest cloud patterns and services to rearchitect many applications each year. Most people are lucky to have the opportunity to create foundational technical direction a few times in their careers. Because of our virtually endless supply of modernization and cloud rebuild projects, our TPMs make these decisions every week. Day-to-day, TPMs: Turn high-level technical specs into detailed designs that engineers can execute on Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Define the acceptance criteria to measure engineering deliverables against There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3335-BR-Brasília-TechnicalProdu.006

title: ARQUITETO DE SISTEMAS – BPM /SOA
subtitle: Ewave do Brasil
snippet: Projetar e desenvolver, de acordo com as definições do cliente, a arquitetura de software de acordo com as tecnologias definidas, ...
fulltext: Job Description Trabalhe em uma multinacional israelense, referência em soluções de tecnologia no Brasil. Estamos com vagas para ARQUITETO DE SISTEMAS – BPM \ SOA Main responsibilities Orientar e acompanhar analistas, projetistas e desenvolvedores acerca da arquitetura e implementação de processos usando as tecnologias definidas para os projetos. Desenvolver provas de conceitos relacionadas às formas de uso das tecnologias definidas para os projetos. Atuar nas questões de otimização de desempenho, dimensionamento de capacidade e reuso de componentes de software e\ou processos de negócio usando as tecnologias definidas para os projetos. Projetar e desenvolver, de acordo com as definições do cliente, a arquitetura de software de acordo com as tecnologias definidas, atuando nas fases de elaboração, construção e transição do processo de desenvolvimento. Definir componentes e toolkits relacionados às tecnologias definidas para os projetos. Pesquisar soluções para problemas de arquitetura e integração de softwares relacionados às tecnologias definidas para os projetos. Requirements And Skills Formação de nível superior na área de informática, ou formação de nível superior com curso de pós-graduação na área de informática. Experiência mínima de 60 meses exercendo atividades como arquiteto de soluções com foco em BPM, SOA ou micro serviços. Experiência no desenvolvimento ou desenho de aplicações de processo para servidor de aplicação IBM WebSphere Process Server. Análise e tunning de performance de aplicações de processo em servidores WebSphere Process Server. Experiência no desenho e construção de aplicações que possuam características como: Uso intensivo de dados, balanceamento de carga e/ou clusterização; Chamadas assíncronas e troca de mensagens; Uso de serviços web SOAP e REST. Experiência no desenho e construção de soluções que utilizem motores de execução de processos,malhas de serviços e interfaces em CMS (Liferay). Experiência no uso das seguintes ferramentas: IBM Integration Bus, IBM Websphere MQ, Liferay DXP,Apache Maven e Gradle. Possuir, obrigatoriamente, pelo menos 4 (quatro) certificações entre as abaixo listadas: IBM Certified SOA Associate; IBM Certified SOA Solution Designer; IBM Certified Administrator for SOA Solutions - WebSphere Process Server; IBM Certified Solution Developer - WebSphere Business Monitor; IBM Certified System Administrator - WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment; IBM Certified Solution Designer - IBM Rational Unified Process V7.0; IBM Certified Integration Developer - Business Process Manager Advanced V7.5; IBM Certified BPM Analyst - Blueworks Live; Business Process Manager Express or Std. Edition V8.0; IBM Certified BPM Business Analyst - Blueworks Live and Business Process Manager V8.5.6; IBM Certified BPM Application Developer - Business Process Manager Express or Standard Edition V8.0 ou superior; IBM Certified BPM Application Developer - IBM BPM v8.5.7 using Process Designer ou superior; IBM Certified Integration Developer - Business Process Manager Advanced V8.0 ou superior; IBM Certified BPM System Administration - Business Process Manager Advanced V8.5 ou superior; IBM Certified System Administrator - WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V8.5.5 and Liberty Profile ou superior. Additional information PJ ou CLT, horário comercial. Sobre a Ewave Atuando no mercado brasileiro desde 2006, a Ewave do Brasil é parte do grupo Ewave, de Israel. Hoje, já somos um dos principais fornecedores de serviços de soluções de tecnologia do mercado brasileiro. MISSÃO** Estar sempre à frente na criação e disponibilização de soluções tecnológicas inovadoras para o mercado, auxiliando nossos clientes a alcançarem seus resultados com a máxima excelência. VISÃO** Sustentada em seus valores e guiada sempre pela paixão em servir com excelência, ser reconhecida e admirada pelo mercado, clientes e parceiros, como uma das maiores provedoras de soluções tecnológicas inovadoras. Sobre  Website   LinkedIn   Facebook   Instagram

title: Designer UX
subtitle: IBM
snippet: What about all of these? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust – where everyone has a voice? What matters ...
fulltext: Introduction Thomas J. Watson said it best: “Good design is good business.” Visualization is critical to discovering data-driven insights and effectively communicating that knowledge to others. Designers at IBM work to create experiences that work together, work the same, and work for our clients. Does the thought of creating the platform at the heart of solutions like Watson, Blockchain, IoT, and Security excite you? If so, read on! Your Role and Responsibilities Designer UX Required Professional and Technical Expertise  Be responsible for gathering and analyzing information to improve user experience. All positions are eligible for people with disabilities or rehabilitated.*** Preferred Professional And Technical Expertise  Build prototypes that can be tested and presented.  To be able to express their ideas through wireframes, visual as well as verbal language. About Business Unit IBM Services is a team of business, strategy and technology consultants that design, build, and run foundational systems and services that is the backbone of the world's economy. IBM Services partners with the world's leading companies in over 170 countries to build smarter businesses by reimagining and reinventing through technology, with its outcome-focused methodologies, industry-leading portfolio and world class research and operations expertise leading to results-driven innovation and enduring excellence. Your Life @ IBM What matters to you when you’re looking for your next career challenge? Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities – where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust – where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible. Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever. About IBM IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries. Location Statement For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application. Being You @ IBM IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

fulltext: Descrição da empresa MONEYCLOUD é uma plataforma financeira digital, que inclui meios de pagamentos para transferências, recebimentos, cobranças e compras, com objetivo de estimular a inclusão financeira no Brasil. O sistema possui funcionalidades direcionadas a todo e qualquer público, bancarizado ou não, com ênfase no de baixa renda. Nossa missão é criar uma eficiente e acessível alternativa ao sistema bancário tradicional, provendo serviços de um banco digital sem agências. Atividades e Responsabilidades Atender demandas dos sistemas já publicados no mercado, além de poder trabalhar em sistemas ainda em desenvolvimento. Conhecimentos mongoDB, RESTFull, Javascript/jQuery, HTML, CSS (bootstrap). title: NW Design & Optimization Engineer, Rádio WCDMA - Brasília
subtitle: Zenega
snippet: As principais contrapartes são a equipe de projeto de vários fornecedores (gerenciamento de otimização de rede e colegas, atendimento...
fulltext: Dados Da Vaga  Experiência de otimização de vários fornecedores é obrigatória. Experiência em projetos de otimização de RF com operadores ou fornecedores. Experiência prática de otimização 3G / LTE abrangente em projetos de vários fornecedores e outros fornecedores é necessária. O Engenheiro de desempenho RF 3G / LTE é responsável por fornecer serviços de otimização 3G / LTE para os clientes do sistema Multivendor. As principais contrapartes são a equipe de projeto de vários fornecedores (gerenciamento de otimização de rede e colegas, atendimento, implementação de telecomunicações, gerenciamento de projetos, gerenciamento técnico) e organização do cliente (equipe de desempenho de rede, equipe de engenharia de rede e equipe de O & M).  Definição de indicadores-chave de desempenho usando contadores de RAN. Definir parâmetros padrão de RAN de acordo com os sites do modelo. Definição dos principais alarmes a serem monitorados em relação aos indicadores a serem melhorados. Definir e monitorar as regras de verificação de consistência de parâmetros para manter o banco de dados de parâmetros RAN consistente internamente e implementado de acordo com os parâmetros padrão RAN e os parâmetros específicos planejados da RAN. Definição e monitoramento de relatórios de KPIs na rede, área e nível de RAN. Definir e monitorar relatórios de piores objetos no Node-B. Análise e resolução de problemas dos relatórios de piores objectos, recomendando alterações de software, alterações de hardware ou alertas de O & M em caso de problemas de hardware. Analisar as medidas do teste do inversor para detectar eventuais problemas e recomendar alterações para corrigir esses problemas. Dar sugestões ao departamento de planejamento de RF em termos de capacidade, qualidade e cobertura para fases de expansão. Teste e implementação de novo recurso para melhorar o desempenho geral da rede de rádio 3G / LTE. Eventualmente, em um projeto, coordenando e validando o trabalho técnico de um pequeno grupo de engenheiros de desempenho de RF 3G / LTE. Benefícios: Assistência Odontológica, Seguro de vida em grupo, Seguro saúde, Tíquete-refeição Regime de contratação: CLT (Efetivo) Perfil: Profissional Área Profissional  Informática /TI / Engenharia da Computação  Internet/ E-Commerce/ E-Business/ Web/ Web Designer Nível Hierárquico  Profissional especializado com curso superior
